import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Single({price, address, image, name, posted, user, features, bed, wifi, user_id, size, booked, electronics, type}){ const {id} = useParams() return( <>
{name}
1450 Sq.Ft.
x3       x4
{address}
KES. {price}
by {user}
{name == null? "Explore More" : "Order"}
) }
